name: The Absence of the Book
description:
The Absence of the Book is a small 1 lvl top down 2D dungeon crawler based within the fire at Windsor castle in 1992.  With the collection of magic gems you have the capability to teleport back 100 years from the current time to collect all game objects to complete the stage.

This game was created as a university project using GameMaker Studio 2 Drag and Drop coding as my first game project (with that in mind, please be easy on any criticism, but all feedback would be appreciated).

THIS IS AN ALPHA PROTOTYPE AND WILL ONLY TAKE 10MIN OR LESS TO COMPLETE.

(This took 60 hours of development and art creation as my first project).
